radiographic_examinations.findings: well-demarcated, mixed-echoic lesion, 4.2 cm by 4.1 cm, in the right lobe of the liver.
dominant encapsulated mass, 4.2 cm by 3.9 cm, in the right lobe of the liver with intense enhancement in the arterial phase.
perihepatic hematoma that extended 35 mm from the right hepatic border.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: findings stabilized by the time of discharge

radiographic_examinations.findings: nodular enhancement surrounding the ablation zone consistent with residual disease; satellite lesions in segments five and six appeared stable.
